invoice-instructions.title: Invoice instructions
invoice-instructions.description: Please, transfer the full invoice amount to the bank account displayed in this page. Your order will stay pending until the payment has been cleared.

sepa-direct-debit.title: Payment and mandate information
sepa-direct-debit.description: By signing this mandate form, you authorise (A) {Company Name} to send instructions to your bank to debit your account and (B) your bank to debit your account in accordance with the instructions from {NAME OF MERCHANT}. As part of your rights, you are entitled to a refund from your bank under the terms and conditions of your agreement with your bank. A refund must be claimed within eight weeks starting from the date on which your account was debited.
sepa-direct-debit.agreementLabel: I agree to the following mandate
